name: Blox (itch) (AskPlays)
description:
Blox the multiplayer block stacking puzzle game. 

Play online against other players in a multiplayer lobby or compete for the top scores on the online leaderboard.
Play a whole heap of gamemodes such as 40 lines, four wide, digger and much more in singleplayer.

Controls: (changeable in game)

Arrow keys to move
Z, X, C to rotate
Space to hard drop
Shift to hold
